name: The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush
about: What it is:u00a0A tool that combines the hot air of a blow-dryer with the structure of a round brush to create a smooth, shiny blowout with tons of volume in one simple step...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Volume.- Shine.- Frizz..What Else You Need to Know: This toolu2019s ionic technology seals the cuticle for less frizz and tons of shine while styling. Its strategically placed vents provide maximum airflow for a faster blowout while its ergonomic, lightweight design provides maximum comfort. The 2.44-inch oval shape with gently curved edges provides tons of volume.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing, thoroughly towel-dry hair to remove excess water. For extra-thick or long hair, it may be necessary to rough-dry hair with a regular blow-dryer before using The Double Shot Oval Blow-Dryer Brush..-Brush out hair using a detangling brush or comb and separate into large sections..-Place the blow-dryer brush underneath each section, and work it gradually from roots to ends until the section is dry and smooth..-For volume at the roots, use horizontally at the crown..-The Double Shot can also be used on dry hair to create a smooth, finished look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. My thick curly hair takes a good blow dry really well, and I definitely saved a ton of money avoiding the salon with this bad boy. Not too heavy, but could be lighter. The long cord is great. After almost a year (11 months), it is smoking more than Iu2019m comfortable with, so Iu2019m looking into another blow dryer like Shark style. Unsure how long blow dryers are supposed to last

If I could give zero stars, I would.  Used this brush maybe a dozen times, if that, and it just stopped working completely.  Doesnu2019t turn on at all.  The biggest waste of money and such a disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this brush for several months now, and I do like it quite a bit overall. I find it's best if you wait until your hair is just lightly damp so that you only need to use it for a few minutes. It does a great job of straightening and adding volume to my mid-length, fine hair. I did find the bristles flattened out quite a bit fairly early on, but that didn't seem to reduce the tool's effectiveness at all. The cord is the absolute worst though. For such a pricey tool, it should come with a much better cord. Overall, worth the purchase.

reviews.review_title: Great at first but only for first 5-10 uses.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blow dryer brush is great-for the first 5-10 uses or so. I only straighten my wavy/curly hair once a month MAX, and after 6 months the bristles flatten, so the product doesn't effectively dry as well and it requires several more passes to properly straighten the hair. This brush doesn't have much power. It doesn't get hot enough to be the most effective.

I bought both the 1/2 shot and double shot last year. While I LOVE them, I HATE how it makes my hair smell. It has a very distinct smell almost like being plastic. And it sticks in my hair. I never used it on soaking wet hair, I never got it clogged. Itu2019s the same smell that comes out of my dry bar hair dryer. Itu2019s terrible. Maybe Iu2019m just super sensitive but Dyson air wave doesnu2019t have the same smell because the brush is made out of metal. Which I understand isnu2019t great for your hair either. Pick your poison I supposed. Has anyone else notice this?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this a year ago in an excellent holiday deal (it came with a number of products for almost the same price), and...not a fan. While it delivered on the volume and smoothness promise, it took *so long* to dry my hair. To be fair, I have long, thick hair that takes forever to dry, so I had to partially dry my hair with a regular hair dryer before using this, but even that wasn't much of a short cut. The tool itself was also frustrating in that I had to plug in, push the test buttons, unplug, and repeat multiple times before it would start. When I tried to use it last night, it never would power on, so I gave up. In short: More trouble than it's worth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this blow dryer brush for about 3 years now. I have very thick, wavy hair that has been difficult to manage my entire life. I usually have to blow dry than straighten/curl or air dry than straighten/curl, and I have been looking for a solution to shorten my routine my entire life. This was the answer! I tried the Revlon blow dryer brush first, but found that it was very damaging to my hair. This tool by Drybar was the answer. It does not leave my hair feeling damaged- instead it leaves it silky and shiny and so smooth! I take it on all of my travels. If I could only bring one beauty product with me, it would be this!! I truly swear by it. From right out of the shower (wet hair), I can have a beautiful blowout that lasts for days in just 20 minutes. I will continue to use this product forever and I hope that Drybar knows what a wonderful product they have created in this for us thick-hair gals! Thank you Drybar!
Died after less then a month. Complete waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for an alternative for the Dyson like I was, this is not it. Thereu2019s nothing good about this brush. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to write a review from the perspective of someone who knows very minimal about hair and who doesn't do much to their hair at all (cue the downvotes). Before buying this, it had been years since the last time I've blow-dried my hair (partly because I don't have the patience, and partly because I didn't care enough). This tool dried my hair (I have a lot of it, it's thick and long for reference, the Greek genes were strong) within 15 minutes (!!!). For those of you who don't want to put in too much effort but look more put-together, this is great and it's way easier than using a regular blowdryer with brush in your hand. It does give fly-aways, but I'm sure there are products that would evade this. Also, for the people comparing it to Revlon the major difference is the heat settings which will save your hair in the long run. Also it's super light!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was good while it lasted. I used it for about a year until the bristles burned off. For this price, it should last longer than a year. I purchased the Lu2019Oru00e9al brush instead. Itu2019s and seems like the quality is the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I would have found this brush a long time ago. It saves me so much time in drying my hair and is a literal brazilian blowout in a brush! I prefer going to bed with my hair wet but tying it with 3 hairties and then wake up with damp hair before using this, it takes longer if your hair is soaked. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not worth it. My hair isnt even thick, it took much longer to get decent results and even then my hair is not as nice as when i do it with the Revlon one. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This dryer has changed my hair styling life. I have naturally curly hair but I'm lazy so I keep it wavy/straight. it takes no time to get a polished look, so long as you either rough dry or if you're me, air dry to rough dry. It's not for everyone but I love this dryer now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: TL;DR I returned this product.  I can see how this would be a great product with fine hair and/or if you struggle with drying with a round brush, but if that isn't the case I wouldn't bother. For my long, wavy hair, this dryer took *much* longer than my normal dryer, even after turban-drying and rough drying with my normal hairdryer, and I saw no added benefits (smoothness, shininess, etc.). In addition, this operates at a high pitch that I found too uncomfortable for extended use.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use and super effective
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love LOVE this thing! I have thick hair that takes forever to dry and am notoriously lazy about styling my hair (for that reason). This blow dry brush gives me a perfect blowout in 30 minutes, and I feel so much more put together and cute with it. I had never used a brush like this prior and had my doubts, but got the hang of it really quickly. It is comically big compared to what I expected, but it means that I can use both my hands to maneuver the brush which actually works really well for me.

reviews.review_title: DANGEROUS & shouldnu2019t be on the market!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the Revlon version of this hot tool for 2 years and loved it. When it was time for a new blow dry brush I decided to u201cupgradeu201d to the Dry Bar as I am a big fan of many of their productsu2026 let me tell you I am SHOCKED at my experience. Not only is the price way too high for almost zero difference from itu2019s competition, this tool randomly stopped working after 2 months of use. I only ever use my blow dry brush twice a week and I always store it properly. A week after it didnu2019t turn on, I decided to try one more time to see if maybe it was a bad outlet or somethingu2026 I plugged the brush in, turned it on and immediately saw a glowing red orb within the brush. The handle got burning hot INSTANTLY and the brush began smoking, this happened within SECONDS of me twisting the handle to turn it on. It nearly combusted into flames in my hand. I have no idea how such a poorly-made, dangerous product made itu2019s way onto the market, especially by a brand like Dry Bar. Iu2019ve read way too many other reviews about dangerously defective brushes, this item should be pulled until Dry Bar can fix the issues this tool clearly has!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate washing my hair because it takes forever to blow dry it. I have a ton of shoulder length hair. I love the look of a good blowout with a round brush but honestly donu2019t have the patience (or arm strength) to do it at home. This brush has completely changed that!  It dries my hair in half the time and it looks like a professional blowout every time!  I used to have the Revlon version but it got really hot and was painfully loud. I donu2019t have either of those issues with the Drybar version!  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great, but you can get better for less $$
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product and used it for a year and a half until it stopped working one day. It helped me get more volume, smoother blowouts and really saved time. It was so much easier than a round brush and traditional blow dryer. That said, once it died (in the middle of a blow out) I decided to try a less expensive brand (Hot Tools) and I quickly realized how overpriced this product is. For $50, my new one dries my hair faster, leaves it feeling smoother, doesnu2019t seem to dry it out as much, and has better bristles that donu2019t fall out and/or get so bent they become useless. So, overall, no beef with this product specifically, but you donu2019t need to spend this kind of money on it if you donu2019t care about the brand.
awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: How the heck are you supposed to hold this thing, it's HUGE! My hand cannot fit around it. Definitely returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I think itu2019s worth the investment for your hair health.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: tried it once, and so far I really like it. I prefer it over my Revlon blow-dry brush. it works quicker and I like the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this a while ago and finally had the courage to use it. (Iu2019m terrible at styling my hair especially since it takes me forever-usually like an hour) It took me 20 minutes! And my hair looked amazing! It was so easy to get that fresh out of the salon look. The best part is that my hair looked smooth and felt light. Not fried from when I do blow dry it. The only thing I noticed was that my hair was oily the next day. Not sure if thatu2019s because of the blow dryer brush or my hair in general.

reviews.review_title: Its ok, but could be better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very long hair,  down my back and hits right at my butt. My hair is also very thick and textured. This tool helps to smooth my hair but takes an extremely long time to dry. I'd say approximately 30 minutes plus to dry. It's a bit of a pain, but gives an overall nice finish.

reviews.review_title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU STILL WANT LONG HAIR
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product caused so much breakage in such a short amount of time. I have thinner bleached hair and lost so much length using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: a bit of background- I dont have the dexterity to use my dyson dryer with a round brush, so I love hot air brushes- have had one since I was maybe 10 years old.    i bought one of these elsewhere on sale- my really old conair hot brush was acting up, so I started looking into reviews.  I was looking at the DB double shot (2yr warranty), the amika blowdry buffet set (1yr warranty), and the new revlon 1-step plus.  the plus isn't available in Canada yet, the amika apparently gets really hot, and so I settled on the drybar.    I just used it for the first time, hair towel dried to maybe 65%?  my hair is naturally quite thick, but it currently fried from bleaching.  my hair always smells like burning when I use flat irons above 300u00b0f.  I used a claw clip to throw up the majority and worked my way from in bottom to top, no heat protectant, not really trying for volume at the roots, but trying for a smooth result on the low setting (there's a cold setting, low setting, high setting).  I'm very much looking forward to trying it with my various heat protectant products like the Verb leave in mist!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this product. I used to spend an hour drying and straightening my hair at the price of having loads of split ends! after using this product, my split ends are gone and drying plus styling takes half the time! I have curly hair  so I use this to make them more tame and pretty! Here is a picture of my hair from 2 days ago after using the drybar with some hair oil and curl defining cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing tool. One giant downside! You cannot adjust the heat level. It gets insanely hot when used for a long period of time. I have long hair and this is absolutely frying it :( sucks cuz itu2019s so good otherwise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this brush , i have fine thin hair . It is wonderful gives me wonderful bounce. After using I felt like i just came out of the salon .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice results if you have thin hair; not worth the price, nothing revolutionary about it, just get the Revlon instead; has a very weird high pitched noise on the high setting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing hair tool, I have used it once and I'm hooked. I finished my entire head (hair is a little past my shoulders, usually curly) in about 5 minutes, fully dried, hair feels very soft and it styled it for me. The big brush makes its very easy and quick to finish, there was no pulling or tugging. Easily replaces 2-3 tools that I would normally use to get half of the results and it is not too hot. I highly recommend to anyone who likes a bit of bounce in their hair with a sleek look.

reviews.review_title: Expected more - Not what I hoped it would be
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I read reviews about how this dryer does not generate heat like the Revlon dryer brush and that was more gentle on your hair. I found this dryer to get very hot on the high setting and hot on the low setting. I was hoping for a cool setting but there is none. The barrel is BIG. My hair is shoulder length and I feel like it is too big for my hair length. My hair does not get voluminous like with other dryer brushes. With this brush, it drys my hair quickly, flattens, and straightens but it does not smooth so I have a lot of flyaways. With other dryers, my hair feels fresh and hydrated afterward. With the Double Shot, it feels dry and lifeless. If I can return this, I will. Or will give away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I bought this particular tool on a whim. I have been wanting to try a blow dryer brush for months and just hadnt found one with all the features I was looking for. Then this one came up as a special for Christmas, complete with several drybar products, and I thought I'd buy myself a present and give it a try. I am absolutely amazed at what this does to my hair. i have very fine hair that is barely longer than my shoulders, so no getting volume is a near impossibly. and even though they said they were anti-frizz, every hair dryer I've used before this did little to nothing for frizz. after I've just of this till, wow. my hair is smooth and shiney and full of volume. i feel like a movie star with how amazing my hair is. it took a little getting used to to figure out the brush plus dryer, but this is so much better than every dryer + round brush combo I've tried before. I can actually have a blowout last for days now. it's amazing.

reviews.review_title: Great, but the noise will drive you crazy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super thick hair that means blow-drying takes 45 mins. With this, it's only 15. But it has a SUPER annoying high pitched sound when it's on high, I have to do a section and walk away for 10 min to get it out of my head. It's efficient and gives me great hair but the noise is terrible. I'm sensitive to that though so if you're stronger than I, it's perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I never thought I would be able to achieve such flouncy weightless curls and now I can make them each morning!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm honestly blown away with this blow-dryer brush. I have wavy/curly fine hair and it's always such a pain to blow dry it or style it and to be honest, I'm way too lazy to always have to straighten in. I also didn't want to have to buy a new dryer with the attachments for a blowout as well as a new brush, so my boyfriend got me one of these for my birthday. It is honestly amazing. I just let my hair air dry for maybe 15-20 minutes before using it and I can get my whole head done in about 15 minutes and it looks naturally straight/wavy. It also helps with frizz!!! I definitely recommend this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s really easy to use , it not too heavy , dry hair in not too long , makes styling easier , I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just received this blow dryer and I absolutely love it. I always struggled to blow dry my hair the way they do in the salon with brush and dryer and this tool makes it so easy giving the same blowout salon affect. Also really helps with frizz and smooths out hair. Absolutely love and highly suggest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute best hair drying tool I have ever used, and Iu2019ve tried many!  My hair tends to friz, but this dryer leaves me with smooth hair that is full of body. Itu2019s a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Drybar Double Shot Dryer for eight months.  I have shoulder length hair which is very wavy, and this dryer does help.  My concern is the heat that it produces.  The dryer gets so hot at times, it's difficult to touch my hair when I'm finished with a section.  The brush itself looks like heck after only eight months.  The yellow paint has faded from the edges of the dryer, and the yellow dots on the bristles have just about all fallen off.  I really question the heat that the dryer produces.  The dryer does not have a low, or medium heat setting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have always had issues getting the perfect blowout like me, attempting to coordinate a big bristle brush and your blow dryer, purchase this. If you have tried these kinds of tools out from Walmart such as Revlon and other cheap brands, and it ultimately sucked, purchase this instead. It exceeded my expectations. I have long wavy hair that has been bleached many times over the years, I was worried this wouldn't dry my hair unless it was close to being dry already before using, but within 15 minutes fresh out the shower I had the most gorgeous blowout. My hair didn't tangle in the brush, and it dried fully, and depending on how you move the brush it legitimately styles your hair its almost like a straightener and blow-dryer in one! I am beyond shoooook at this. I got compliments all day today on my hair. Its silky smooth blowout perfection and this is what I will do everyday with my hair!

reviews.review_title: The innovation I've been waiting for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hard to believe it took this long for something like this to come along... it seems so obvious, doesn't it? Amazing to have the power of a hairstylist right at home doing those blow-outs I couldn't do on my own - until now! Hair is smoothed in the process, and dries quickly. My two daughters tried mine and each got one themselves (they are adults - living on their own) - so between us we own 3... it is that good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Prior to buying this I had gone 1 year without a haircut due to the pandemic. I used this after my shower and my hair looked AMAZING!! Came home from beach volleyball, didnu2019t wash my hair, used this and my boyfriend couldnu2019t believe the difference!!  Btw I finally got my haircut. Results arenu2019t as drastic but my hair still looks fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!  I use one a week for full style and then daily for touch ups and love the fact that I can style the back.  When I bought wasnu2019t sure how much I would use but this is my all time favorite hair style tool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t waste you money stopped working after 5 uses and fought on fire .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim during the sale and I havenu2019t picked up my dyson airwrap since. This gives a more voluminous u201cstraighteru201d blowout compared to the airwrap. I have fine frizzy super wavy hair for reference. I donu2019t have to use any styling products and it holds and stays straight and smooth even overnight. This is great if you have longer thicker hair too because the barrel is so much bigger it drys faster. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d give it 4 stars but itu2019s very heavy and hard to hold for me. It definitely drys my hair quickly and leaves my hair smooth, especially when using Drybar styling products. It is very cumbersome for my small hands and weak grip. I need to take breaks while using it. Pricey but we will see how long it lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not for thick hair. I had such high hopes for this and I was so excited to try it but I was so underwhelmed especially for the price $$$! Iu2019ve been using a revlon blow brush and it gave me such a great blow out Iu2019d though Iu2019d treat my self and get a nicer version. Iu2019m so unimpressed it did not smooth my frizzy thick hair which was one of the main reasons I purchased. Not only was I unable to smooth out my hair but it didnu2019t give my hair any of the body that you would get from a blowout brush. Only 1 star because the packing itu2019s the only thing nice about this hair tool.

reviews.review_title: Not suited for Really Thick Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I thought I would be upgrading from the Revlon One Step Dryer but unfortunately thatu2019s not the case. This is not suited for my thick hair, it always gets stuck and leaves my hair super frizzy. Even when paired with Hot Toddy and a Olaplex styling creme. It pulls on my thick hair instead of gliding like the Revlon one step. The only pro I can give this dryer is that I feel like it isnu2019t as damaging as my Revlon One Step. Other than that Itu2019s been in its box for months and I only used this twice. A miss for me.

reviews.review_title: waste of money! get revlon blow dry brush instead.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: let just say that it works! I wish I would've bought the cheaper version instead. This one is expensive and it not as powerful. it takes a long time to dry your hair compared to the Revlon version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this came in handy when  I was in Antigua and was having to wash my hair daily. I was washing my hair more than normal but was wanting to style it completely because it would just get messed up doing the beach all day. What made it nice was I could sit & watch tv as I ran it through my hair. My hair is mid back length, naturally curly. So this did help with the frizz. When I try to use it for REAL styling purposes, I just wonu2019t. I donu2019t think it does a good job at all for styling. My hair needs a roll brush to look finished. This doesnu2019t give that tight, sleek look at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Once I learned how to use it, I fell in love!!! I give myself professional looking blow outs all the time now. My friends don't believe I'm doing it myself! Truly a game changer. I have long thick hair and this size works well for me. I recommend it to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good product, works exactly as it should, not too heavy to hold.. and my hair glides smoothly in the bristles. A little expensive but not too bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this for a couple of weeks now and it's honestly changed my life! I have naturally extremely frizzy, thick, wavy hair, and this makes my hair look so effortlessly beautiful and frizz-free. I used to get Brazilian Blowouts 3-4 times a year and this gives me the exact same look in about 35-40 minutes (it's already paid for itself in that sense). I also typically struggle so much using hair tools but this was so easy to learn how to use. This gave me exactly what I wanted, a basic, natural looking blowout. Overall I totally recommend if you have hair like mine and struggle with using hair tools to tame it. My only concern is how long this will last me, as the bristles are already spreading/bending. It'd be a shame to have to replace it frequently but time will tell.

reviews.review_title: Bought due to reviews-returned due to outcome
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because it received so many stellar reviews and looked like it could solve the problem of needing 2 hands to dry my hair. I'm gonna have to say the device is pretty big and feels incredibly cheap, like cheap plastic. I tried it and realized very quickly that it would not give me the salon results I was hoping for. I used it on half of my head and used my Dyson blow-dryer on the other half. My Dyson provided far superior results, it made my hair smoother much quicker and actually made my hair look healthier. The Drybar Double Shot left  my hair pretty straight with just a bit of frizz and a bit lack lustre. I think this could work really well if you maybe already have straight hair. So, maybe not for everyone depending on the results you are seeking. I really wanted to love it but...it's a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband bought this for me for Christmas and itu2019s been one of my favourite gifts. It has cut down my styling time to 20 minutes, which is great as I have course long hair.

reviews.review_title: Great results for my curly hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! I have thick curly hair and can not do a blowout to save my life but this makes it so easy.  I've seen some comments saying the brush is loud...but so is a blow dryer. Nothing unexpected.  Not sure what the cold shot is supposed to do? That feature doesn't function too well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best investment ever! I am in love. I have a lot but fine hair with natural waves and often tending to frizz, dryness and not controllable. I never managed to blow dry my hair and the iron also didnt properly manage the mess. It takes me 10 minutes with this tool to have a proper looking blow dry style. So amazing and worth every $.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The hairdryer itself dries hair well. Was disappointed that it didnu2019t take long for the bristles to start to melt and bend, and even had spots where the bristles disappeared completely. I should note that I am someone who takes care of things really well. It was always stood up to cool off after use and I always cleaned the filter and removed any hair from the bristles. Iu2019ve had it less than a year and it just stopped working completely. Worked one day. Didnu2019t turn on the next. Not worth the price point. I suggest the revlon !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blow dryer! Makes my hair so smooth, shiny and soft. I just let my hair air dry 1/2 way and then I blow dry it with this. My hair air dries wavy so even when itu2019s half dry it still smooths out my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was so easy to use- i've always struggled to blow out my long wavy hair smoothly, so this is a game changer. It still takes about the same amount of time as with my hair dryer, but I don't mind because the results are so much better and I feel like it isn't so hot that it will damage my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m...in disbelief. I was really excited to try this, since I have long, wavy, frizzy and dense hair. Blow drying can take upwards of an hour at times, so I usually wait until my hair is almost dry before smoothing it out with a traditional blow dry/round brush. So the only thing I used today was the Olaplex 7 oil and it only took me 25 minutes to dry and smooth my hair. The amazing thing about this tool is that I can take much larger chunks of hair, and I can also get it right to the base of my scalp without burning it. I also have more control since I can grab the outer part of the brush. I will absolutely never go back to a regular blow dryer. If you have thick, dense, wavy hair- itu2019s a life changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This thing has changed my life. I would rate it 10/5 except that after only a year it shows some *serious* wear and tear.   But first, Myhair is dried and styled in less than 10 minutes. I couldnu2019t believe it the first time I used it, and itu2019s only gotten better as Iu2019ve perfected my technique, but itu2019s not at all hard to use. I could never manage to blowout my hair with a regular dryer and a round brush, because I just didnu2019t have the coordination. With this, thereu2019s no need for coordination, itu2019s a one-and-done.  I have thick, color and keratin-treated 2b/c wavy hair about 3u201d below my shoulders, that Iu2019ve put through the ringer in the past year. With the right product combo and this tool, my hair has literally never looked this good.   My technique: I put my hair up in an alligator clip and take down each horizontal section, four in total, with the last being the crown. I hold it horizontal and wrap a section of hair about the length of the brush part and then pull it down taught curling the end up, to smooth the top, and do that for the rest of the section, then I go back and start over, this time blowing it out parallel to the floor and curling under for volume, then repeat for the rest of the section. Iu2019ve found that this process makes my hair super smooth but with a ton of touchable volume. For the last section at the crown, I brush it forward over my face and work back to front - under, then over - and let it all cool before I finally shake out the most perfect blowout Iu2019ve had. Seriously, itu2019s better than a salon and takes way less time.  I will say that I usually let my hair air ~80% before styling with the Doubleshot, but Iu2019ve done it freshly towel dried before, it just takes a lot longer, I have to go over each individual piece about 4 times instead of 2. But the Doubleshot is also AWESOME on dry hair!   BUT - it looks beat up after only a year, and Iu2019m not that hard on it. Rubbed off paint, crooked bristles, etc but I still use it every time I wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! Been wanting to try a blowout brush and decided on this one after reading reviews on this brush in comparison with the revlon and amika brand brushes. I have really curly, thick, long hair and am amazed at how easy it was to blow out my hair with this brush! Gave my hair so much volume. Will be using it regularly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first dryer brush I've tried, I wanted to give it a go because I like the look of a blowout but I'm terrible at using a hair dryer and brush on myself. I definitely found it was easy to use but I would recommend starting on hair that's already 80% dry otherwise it can take a long time to dry completely. I don't know that it did anything special in terms of shine or frizz. Giving it 4 stars because it seems a little pricy for what it is but I hope I'll get some good use out of it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this dryer. But in the end, I decided to return it. All I wanted was a hair dryer with more heat options so it wouldnu2019t fry my hair the way other, cheaper dryer brushes do. However, this dryer really has the same heat settings as other dryers on the market (i.e., high, low that is really a slower speed, and cool). Unlike other dryers, this one doesnu2019t get as hot and and has a smaller barrel. Unfortunately, what that means for my hair is that the frizz remains and the sleek look I created disappears within 20 minutes even though my hair is usually very manageable. I ended up having to go over it again with a curling iron.

reviews.review_title: Five Star Performance u2b50ufe0f, but one drawback
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This works like a dream...bouncy full looking hair. No need to flatiron, and it works quickly. I am not going back to average hairdryers thatu2019s for sure. One thing thatu2019s annoying is the pitch when on high speed...very high pitched motor noise near your ear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: Love it! I tried the Revlon one to just try one of these blow dryer brushes and hated it... so I was hesitant to try this one. This is SO much better. Smoothed my hair, gave it a good bounce, and dried my hair quickly. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Iu2019m very happy with this! For background, I have shoulder length, naturally curly, fine hair. With this I am finally able to get really straight hair with volume, even in the back! Itu2019s easy and it works wonderfully for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely changed the way I do my hair... I have wavy/curly frizzy hair and itu2019s so time consuming to blow dry and flat iron, I gave up, until I saw this, watched a few reviews and Iu2019m totally amped I bought it. My hair looks healthier, bouncer and overall great. Worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had bad luck with this dryer and I was really hoping it would live up to all the great reviews.  Sadly, it did not. Very unhappy with the performance and the cost.  It does not get hot enough to really make a difference so I am going to try the much cheaper Revlon hot air brush.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use, not great for wavy/frizzy hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this sooo badly, but it's not for my hair texture. I have long wavy hair, and even with Drybar products I couldn't get the top layer to stop frizzing.   PROS: Super lightweight, easy to use, didn't get overly hot (e.g., I could touch my hair immediately after each pass), long rotating cord, it's cute!  CONS: Since I have wavy, frizz-prone hair, it didn't do a great job of getting rid of that halo of frizz I get when I air dry my hair. My hair realistically would take 30-45 minutes of air drying to get dry enough to use this dryer (you can't use it to rough dry), and that's not realistic for getting ready in the morning.  I got this dryer b/c I need to have my own dryer, but if I needed to get rid of frizz I would realistically need to have a separate dryer to rough dry + blow dry downwards to get rid of frizz (yes, I used the dryer on layer in a downward direction (i.e., my hair was beneath the brush)).   tl;dr - not good for frizz elimination and can't rough dry. Wouldn't recommend for thick-ish hair.

reviews.review_title: Worth the 3x price tag compared to its competitor
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been a long time user of the revlon dryer but had heard that long term use of the revlon was really damaging so I found this as an alternative. I am very pleased so far! The first thing I noticed is that the tip of this tool does not get hot so it makes it much easier to use then the revlon. Another great feature - this toolu2019s bristles/brush. Theyu2019re made much better then the revlons and grip/grab by thick, curly hair without me fearing it getting stuck. It definitely provides a smooth blow out with a lot of volume but not so much that you look like an extra on set in the 80s. Overall, I think this is worth the 3x price tag compared to the revlon. Iu2019m glad I bought it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally never leave reviews for products, but my goodness this changed my life. I have frizzy, unruly hair, but this blow dryer brush left my hair silky and smooth. I usually have to flat iron my hair to have it smooth and silky, but that always makes my hair limp and flat. This left my hair voluminous with the perfect amount of bounce. I love this. THANK YOU DRYBAR.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought one for my daughter for Christmas, tried it myself and loved it so bought another.  I can't say enough .. it is lightweight, easy to use, smooths even without product and never snags or tangles your hair. Eliminates the two step process of hair dryer / curling irons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019ve been contemplating this just do it! I have thick VERY long hair. I would never even attempt to blow out my own hair. Straighteners were my only option but I wanted something to give me more volume. The Double Shot is perfect!!! It takes a bit more time but itu2019s totally worth it. My hair has volume and gorgeous movements. Almost zero frizz also. Itu2019s amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best hair tool I have ever used!  I have long, thick, curly hair, and have never been able to blow out my hair without it getting frizzy.  This dryer has changed that!  It took me about 30 minutes to make my hair look nearly as good as it does when I leave the salon.  Iu2019m really impressed!  Well worth the $150.  Donu2019t hesitate!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this thing! From someone who has extremely course, thick and curly hair, this is a dream. I actually enjoy doing my hair after washing it now. It has made the process so much easier. I hardly ever use a straightener afterwords, only if I let it air dry too long and need a little extra help around the hairline. Buy this! You wonu2019t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works amazing. I have curly hair so i find it super easy instead of trying to blow dry with a brush and a dryer just to be able to go through with one tool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited when I saw the other reviews written by people with curly/thick/coarse' hair. It sounded like this was finally a product that would work on my thick, wavy hair. It did not. While it did blowdry my hair straight-ish, it also left it huge and puffy and honestly still pretty frizzy. It did NOT make my hair sleek and shiny in the least. I'm terrible at blowdrying my hair with a brush but even I can do a much better job than this tool. I was SOOO hopefuly that this would leave my hair straight/sleek enough to go out in public (I knew it would never be straightener sleek) but I couldn't leave my bathroom let alone house! I'm so happy for the curly/thick/coarse haired ladies this worked for (and quite frankly am jealous) but I am not one of them and I would warn others with similar hair to keep their expectations in check. I ended up returning and Sephora was wonderful with that process

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After reading all the reviews, I was super excited about getting this dryer. Unfortunately, I didn't get the outcome I wanted it; mainly due to the texture of my hair. If you have hair like mine - thick, coarse, and wavy, it will straighten your hair but with too much volume. I've tried different hair products, but the outcome was the same every time. Every morning, I have to use my straightener to minimize the volume.

reviews.review_title: Where has this been all my life!?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This blow-dryer brush is amazing! I have really thick, curly hair which is just about medium length right now and the whole process took about 25 mins and I have a perfect blow out! Normally I blow dry my hair, straighten it and then curl it to get waves, but I just cut down my hair time with this product. It. Is. Amazing. I am so glad I took the plunge and purchased this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: J'ai les cheveux fins et long jusqu'au nombril.  Point positif:  - super leger - le cordon tourne tres bien - mes cheveux su00e8che assez rapidement - donne du volume  Point nu00e9gatif: - mon blow out n'est pas autent prononcu00e9, mais c'est peut etre a cause de la longueur de mes cheveux - me laisse bcp de frizz

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super hesitant to purchase this, considering the price point. However, after plenty of research, I decided to go for it and just return it if it wasnu2019t outstanding. This tool is, EVERYTHING!!! It makes my hair so soft and effortlessly beautiful. Iu2019m mostly impressed by how healthy my hair looks after using it, Iu2019m not sure if Iu2019ll ever use a flat iron again. It does take me a while to do my hair with this, but Iu2019m sure the longer I use it the quicker Iu2019ll be able to use it. If youu2019ve been wanting one of these for a while, I hope this is your sign to BUY IT!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hesitated to buy based on the price, but I took the plunge and Iu2019m so glad I did. Absolutely love this. I have long, fine hair and it dries my hair quickly while providing a lot of lift and volume. I feel like I just walked out of the salon. Itu2019s awesome and Iu2019ve told all my friends about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant after the reviews online, but once you get the hang of it, this brush is amazing! In comparison to Revlon, my hair does not feel fried, and it does get hot but feels like a good amount instead of frying it. It is not a NEED but I wanted the blow out look at home and this will get you there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never been able to use a blow dryer and round brush my hair at the same time, and I havenu2019t been able to get the lift my stylist achieves at the salon. I can actually achieve the lift and volume with this product. I have long thick hair so I rough dry it first with a blow dryer. Then I use this tool to get volume at the roots, and my hair looks smooth and polished after about 5 minutes.  Iu2019ve tried cheaper versions of hot brushes in the past, but they donu2019t have enough power. This has the heat and power of a blow dryer. I love the results. I use this every day now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It does keep my hair from frizzing out but sometimes still need a flat iron if I really want super straight hair. I like it and havenu2019t had any problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While this does cut my drying time significantly, it leaves my hair frizzy with no volume. I get a much better, fuller blowout with a round brush and blow drier. And donu2019t have to put several products on my hair to combat the frizz

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this brush when I first bought it... I swore by it!!! Told everyone I knew they needed it and used it frequently. I probably used it on average about 4 times a week and after a year the brush had started getting very hot and makes a popping noise sometimes. It also makes my hair smell burnt and I noticed that my ends dry and breaking off after I used the brush. Itu2019s really disappointing because for the cost of the product and the brand it seems like an item that should last longer than a year of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the dryer but the cord is cheap. Kinks super bad and feels cheap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a full, thick mane of kinky-coily hair (3c-4a) and have to say I was pleasantly surprised by this brush! I combined it with the Amika detangler and was able to completely dry my hair in about 35 minutes (normally it would take me over an hour). It is not only easy to use, it dries hair quickly without the feeling of frying your hair. I canu2019t get over how straight my hair turned out; because of my hair texture, I did have to run the flat iron on the roots because the brush is quite large so it couldnu2019t get the coils close to my scalp, however, that only added about 15 minutes to my styling time. I highly recommend this brush to all curly people out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny! Silky smooth, bouncy hair in minutes. I have thick, wavy, medium length hair and this is even better than my Dyson!  I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! I find it so much easier to dry my hair with this tool. Very reliable, quiet, and efficient! Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No longer need my blow dryer and brush to give myself the best blow out, this dryer brush does it all for me and I LOVE it! Itu2019s changed and reduce my hair routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite hairdryer! It straightens my wavy hair (level 2b pattern) without flattening it. I love that I no longer struggle with holding my hair taut with a brush while using the other hand to aim the blow dryer. This needs to be created as a mini. It is brilliant! I u2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0f it!

reviews.review_title: Truly smoothing and blow out worthy!!! Love!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. I love it - great volume and easy to use. I love the fact that it has true bristles. One point of note. It's large - check the dimensions and videos. I left my Dyson Airwrap in Jamaica and this is even better!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not exaggerating, I have had hundreds of blow drys, in countless cities, and VERY rarely have they understood  how to blow dry my hair. (That goes for my long term hairdresser who is great at color and cut)  Anyway, I decided to try this blow dryer, fully expecting to return it. reviews.review_title: Do yourself a favor and get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally curly hair and this has been such a time saver.   It quickly straightens while keeping the volume I want.  What used to take ~45 minutes, now my hair is done and looks like I walked out of the salon in about 2p minutes.  I do have to clear hair from it about once a month, but that's to be expected since it mimics a round bristle brush.  This has been worth the $ investment.

This is just OK. For the money i paid i expected to be blown away. My hair is naturally straight but thin. Maybe for curly hair types this would be more impressive but I was expecting to Atleast get volume. I think i get better results with my round brush and blow dryer. This is just more convenient with it being 1 combined tool and it does dry fast. As for the sound, yeah itu2019s loud and maybe donu2019t use it while people are sleeping but I donu2019t think itu2019s so loud that it is obnoxious and turn me away from the product. Overall Iu2019m not impressed considering how expensive it is. Go for a cheaper version.. i wanted to wait for the Other one Sephora sells thatu2019s cheaper, just been out of stock for the last 3 weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am Struggling with this brush! My hair is fine and tangly (wavy and absorbs moisture easily). I live in Georgia too so the humidity kills most of my styles unless I go to dry bar and they do it themselves. I use this brush and at first look the blowout is perfect but within minutes of stepping outside all my curl/frizz takes over and it barely holds. It could be that Iu2019m not using the right product but I canu2019t help but feel like itu2019s just not the same as a real blow out. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually hate blow drying my hair, but this makes it so much faster and easier!

reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life??
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had my doubts when ordering this but I am so happy I did.  I used this today for the first time and for me, itu2019s life changing...is that a little dramatic? Lol.  This is the first time in years I blew dry my hair and I was more than happy with it without using a flat iron. My hair has body, shine and bounce.  Thank you Drybar for such an awesome product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Sephora review - that's how passionate I am about this tool. It has changed the name of the game for me and my hair washing routine!  With extremely long, thick hair, I used to reluctantly wash my hair every other day...and would often push it. The barrier for me was always the drying process; my hair takes forever to dry naturally, but it's a pain to blowdry myself.  This tool has changed everything. I LOVE to wash my hair now, because I know I can get my hair from soaking wet to dry in about 15 minutes - with minimal effort, AND without having to use a hot tool to style after. It's shiny, smooth, and it has actually gotten me to wear my hair bouncy/straight more often now.  My tip: let your hair air dry for 15-30 minutes (or longer) if you can, and the drying time will go down even more. I also liked their tip to use it to refresh your blowout - on day 3, I can run the brush through my hair to give it a revived look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this dryer. It truly was so amazing- fried my hair so fast and made it look like I just had my hair blown out at a salon. The major downfall to this product is how loud and high pitched it is. My ears are ringing and everyone in my house could hear it- would not be good for people who get ready while others are sleeping.

reviews.review_title: A yes for my coily hair!

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a black woman with 4a/4b coils. This product is amazing for helping me easily blow out my hair prior to straightening or braid styles. It cuts my blow dry time by at least 1/3. I love it! Itu2019s absolutely worth the purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely fine hair and this product changed my life! Ive never had so much volume and curl to my hair! Super easy to use and stellar end result!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first, and probably last, review I write. This is worth EVERY PENNY. Definitely takes some practice to perfect it, but I will never go back to regular blow dryers again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not my first time using a blow dryer brush but it is my best experience!  Iu2019m not one to put a lot of money into hair appliances but I do have the Drybar full size hair dryer and now this. I tried a department store blow dryer brush.   Iu2019m sure is was less than $50 and it showed!  I continually got my hair tangled in it and after about the third use my hair somehow was caught in the motor and killed the dryer.  So I did without for a while but honestly a brush in one hand and a dryer in the other can be quite the task.  I took a chance and bought this baby and have been happy from the first use.  It is so easy to use and dries hair quickly and smoothly.  And even though Iu2019ve tried, my hair just does not get tangled up in this brush.  I love it. It is also easier to pack for travel than my regular blow dryer!  Highly recommend.  Donu2019t let the price scare you itu2019s worth every penny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this zero stars if I could. This thing is SO loud I used it for no more than 5 min on my bangs and had to stop because it hurt my ears SO bad. I cannot believe I have permanent ear damage because of this dumb product. When I go to sleep at night and lay on my right side, my ear whistles and rings so loudly I can't even sleep on my right side anymore. I want it to stop but it's been 4 months and it's still there!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this brush. I've had a few before this one and they all broke or got way to hot. This brush is incredible- I have long think hair and it only takes 10 mins for a great professional look.

reviews.review_title: A Great styling tool that actually delivers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical to try it at first because I've been in the market for a good universal styling tool--I have very thick hair and drying takes a long time for me. I've tried several in the past, and it was a hard search to find one that didn't tug at my hair or took forever to use. I believe I've found one that finally makes me happy!  It works like a charm once I figured out what works for my hair type. There are three different settings: a cool function, low heat and high heat. I made sure to put in a heat protection spray (Thank you, OUAI!) and started off on the high heat setting to get it dry enough to style. I found switching to low heat to get that coveted curl at the end works best, and then finished it off with the cool setting to tame any flyaways. I recommend sealing it with a styling oil of choice afterwards to keep it soft and smooth.   Overall, the process took me about twenty minutes. I highly recommend this for a relatively easy, beautiful blow out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly was hesitant at first to buy this product because of the price tag but in the end it was extremely worth the purchase. First it allows for you to blow dry your hair in a quick and efficient time allowing for a smooth and shiny blowout. Second itu2019s super easy to travel with as you donu2019t have to bring a round brush and a blow dryer instead you have one compact item. At first it takes a couple tries to get used to it but once you get used to it it works wonders. I have super thick curly blond hair that took almost an hour and a half with a regular blow dryer but with this product I was able to dry my hair in 45 minutes. My suggestion for using this product is only shampoo your hair as the product buildup from conditioner can cause the blow dryer not to work as well and use a blow dryer oil such as the dry bar or drugstore ones are a great alternative! Overall love this product and dry bar never disappoints!

reviews.review_title: Way better than the revlon one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!  I seriously love this tool.  I no longer need to use a blow dryer and flat iron to do my hair.  Super light weight too!  I also wash my hair with the drybar liquid glass shampoo and conditioner and then use the  drybar jump start blow dry cream on towel dried hair.   My hair is fine but I have a lot of it and itu2019s super wavy and frizzy.  I get a nice smooth blow out in literally 15 minutes.   Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I decided to buy this to try it out and it was so worth it. I was so pleasantly surprised. My hair came out smooth and I was able to give it a nice bend at the end. I highly recommend this if you struggle with the traditional blow out method like me.

reviews.review_title: Wished it were a ROUND brush!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shape of this brush is more like a cross between a round and paddle brush (not evently cylindrical) and, as a result, it left my fine, straight hair dome-shaped and flat on top.  Nothing I did boosted the volume.  I tried upside down, pulling it along the top center, on both sides of the hair, and still it fell flat & limp.  I had to use my Conair round rotating brush to try and salvage the style.    It's also really loud and got pretty hot. (I had to put in earplugs while using!)     I think this is best for people with frizzy hair wanting a flat, straightened effect.  For body & volume, it did nothing.

reviews.review_title: Great concept, not convinced it's worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to use this unit as I have always had issues manipulating my blow dryer and round brush at the same time. To have them both in one hand held tool is a wonderful concept! The first several uses produced great results! However after the 3rd use I noticed that the bristles started to frey and the cold setting no longer worked. This resulted in having to work my hair more and adding smoothing serum to the routine to obtain the sleek blow out look that I had previously obtained during the first 2 uses! I have yet to contact Sephora or Dry bar about these issues. Hopefully something can be done about it. The item itself is a good weight and not too heavy. I like that the setting knobs are at the bottom of the unit and out of the way to hinder accidental setting changes. The knob of top of the unit and rotating power chord are also very useful during manipulation of the unit. So you can use the unit without burning your hand and the chord getting in the way. However due to the bristles degrading so fast and the cold setting not working, it leaves me wondering if the unit will actually last to really get my money's worth...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m reading all the other glowing reviews and wondering what I must be missing...after using the Hot Tools version for a year and being able to dry and style my thick mid length hair in 30 minutes (a feat), I u201cupgradedu201d to the Drybar version. Iu2019ve used it twice, once on damp hair and once on air dried hair, and the thing is hopeless. Both times Iu2019ve needed three other tools and double the time to get even an approximation of what the Hot Tools dryer would achieve. Donu2019t waste your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so disappointed this product did not deliver! Iu2019ve been using the Revlon $60 version for a year and decided to u201cupgradeu201d Drybar version does not work on wavy thick hair. Buy the Revlon version! Works amazing! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: flattens hair, not for fine hair
