It does shorten dry time but whatu2019s the use when your hair looks terrible in the end. Iu2019m waiting until stores open to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to purchase because of the price, but Iu2019m loving it. Very easy to use. It dries my thick hair very quickly and keeps it smooth. Looks like Iu2019ve been to the hairdressers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this item. I was a little nervous about buying but Iu2019m so happy I made this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. Absolutely love this. I am not good at doing hair at ALL and when I saw this I knew I had to have it. Yes, it is expensive, but worth every penny! I was able to dry my wet thick hair that I can't do anything with and have it come out beautifully dried and looked styled. I actually received compliments (for the first time ever) and I didn't really have to try. I haven't watched the video tutorials yet, but am excited to watch them and learn more tricks. I recommend this to beginners or anyone who has trouble drying and styling their hair. It really has helped me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best blowdryer I have ever tried !! It makes my hair soooo silky soft and smooth! It is so easy to use !! I would always struggle with using a round brush and blowdryer, it would get caught in my hair and I would just opt to let my hair air dry. This actually makes me excited to blow dry my hair !! You definitely get the perfect salon blowout every time. I was on the edge of buying it or not ... but I must say it lived up to the hype, this tool is one of my favourite purchases Iu2019ve ever made!! I would 10/10 recommend. As you can see in the picture itu2019s hugee. Which allows you to get volume and smooth ends , just like a round brush ! The buttons to switch speeds are cute and easy to use. Great quality all around , it feels expensive, you definitely get what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Love this hairdryer! I have been thinking about getting it for a long time but was put off by the price. On the last 20% off deal I ordered thinking that I would return it unless I absolutely loved it. Well, it has not been returned. Easy to use, lightweight, and it leaves my shoulder length over-processed platinum blonde hair silky and shiny. I canu2019t imagine ever using a regular dryer and round brush again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This brush is better than Dyson, I own both. Drybar brush leaves your hair smooth and silky, where Dyson leaves hair damaged and frizzy. Definitely worth while!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely Love this brush! I've owned several others in a different brand and compared to the DRYBAR, they were a waste of money. This Blow-Dry brush is perfect for my thick hair and I love the fact that it doesn't tangle. Also I can even blow dry and style wet hair is amazing! It gives me that Salon blowout right at home. Highly recommend it, you won't be dissapointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!  I am able to dry and style my hair quickly.  Creates beautiful volume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually never blow-dry my hair because it's such a hassle and takes way too long. I bought this because I was curious and I'm in love. It takes me less than 20 minutes to blow-dry hair now PLUS it straightens it at the same time! It's super lightweight and easy to use. Sometimes my hair is a tad frizzy after but I just run some smoothing leave in product and it's good to go. I almost never let my hair air dry now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this. I usually blow dry my hair with a round brush so this simplifies my routine. it's lighter than my hair dryer and glides through easily. the boar bristles help smooth the ends. so glad I got this! I have medium/fine wavy hair, for reference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Magic!!!  I went into Drybar all the time for blowouts... same effect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This just arrived and I kept the box expecting it to be like any other hair tool.  It took me no time to dry my hair and I no longer need a flat iron or curling iron.  Itu2019s all in one.  I have a lot of fine hair and itu2019s been fried with chemicals.  This smoothed the frizziness as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Salon worthy blowout, super user friendly. I am by no means capable of using a dryer and roller brush separately and thought I would give this a shot. So easy and surprisingly quick! I have very thick, coarse hair and this dried it very quickly without ever getting too hot to handle.

reviews.review_title: I wish I bought this sooner!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many of these blowout dryers, but this one - yes! The Revlon one-step fried my hair. The Hot Tools one-step worked wonders, however, it was quite bulky and recently started to really overheat. I clean the brush & filters regularly. I tried the babylisspro, it was not ergonomically right..my arm would cramp from trying to use it. So I researched and decided to give this one a try. It's less bulky than the Hot Tools or Revlon dryers and the heat is less intense. The volume on my hair - wow! I'm in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All I can say is wow. If youu2019re contemplating about buying this brush, you NEED to buy it! I have many drybar products such as the iron (which I love), but this double shot blowdryer brush is outstanding. I always tried to create the salon blow-out look but my hair is just so thick and I have so much of it that I always struggled to do it before just giving up. After using this brush, I had to fix up my baby hairs and a couple of frizzes on the top of my head with the flatiron, and I was finally able to successfully achieve the u201cperfect blowoutu201d that this brush advertises! Thank you again dry bar for a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blow-dryer brush did not disappoint. I have shoulder-length thick, wavy hair and I was able to get a smooth, straight blowout in about 20 minutes. It also totally eliminated the need for a straightener afterwards. Itu2019s super lightweight and left my hair feeling and looking like I had paid for an expensive blowout. Iu2019m beyond impressed! I went back and forth on whether or not to spend the money on it and Iu2019m so glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would 10 out of 10 recommend this product. I had the Mini Buttercup travel dryer, which recently died. This as a replacement is better. My hair was dried and styled in less time that drying and curling. It is fairly loud on the highest setting, but not too bad on the cool or low setting. It did not get too hot and I was impressed with the bristle strength. I did have to dry in sections, but I already had to with a regular blow dryer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What to say about this product...I'm really not sure. I ended up returning mine, but I think if it were $75 I might have kept it. It's easy to use, but is it that much easier than using a blow dryer and a round brush, which also 100% give a better result? I've been wanting to try the Revlon but I've been burned (literally) by cheap hot hair tools in the past and thought I should try this high end (judging by the price) version. But having used it I'm not sure what makes it high end. It was hard to perceive whether this is really a better implement; it's not cheap feeling, necessarily, but it's not made of nicer materials, didn't make me feel it was better (less damaging) for my hair, and had at least one significant design flaw -- it's a pain to switch on and off (you twist the bottom to the on position; if you're trying to use the cool shot function, good luck not overshooting.) I did my hair twice with it, and once it turned out great, and the other it turned out pretty flat and frizzy. I'm not really sure what the difference was --maybe starting with different level of hair moisture? I think I'm going to try the Revlon after all, it's so much cheaper and will probably be useful in a pinch; it's undeniably easier to use one implement than two (i.e. hair dryer and round brush). I just didn't feel this offered anything extra to me, but maybe it could be useful to someone who absolutely can't use a roundbrush and blow dryer at the same time.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for those who aren't great at hair! Easy!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this and tried it right away and loved it! I have been having problems with frizzy hair and have tried all of the shampoos and masks and nothing had worked until i got this! I am not very coordinated or good with hair stuff in general and this made it super easy!! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super long thick wavy hair. Itu2019s processed and not that easy to smooth. I went back and forth forever on this and finally caved.  Game changer. Highly recommend. Saves time. Super light. Very effective.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use but did not cut down drying time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have long, thick, wavy hair. Normally takes me 45 minutes to blowout with the Drybar Buttercup dryer and a round brush. Very easy to use and it creates a very smooth blowout. However I couldn't get my hair as straight as I could with a blow dryer/round brush and it didn't cut down on my drying time at all. I will still have to go through my hair with a flat iron to get the wave out. The bristles are very frayed after only one use so I'll have to test this out again to see if it still holds up after one use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is thick and coarse and I never thought I could achieve the blowout look at home! And i did!!!! There's really no trick to it you just run it down your hair like your brushing it. I love it!

reviews.review_title: Game changer for me u2014 love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Game changer for me and my hair. I have very little patience for doing my hair and Iu2019m not skilled. I have wavy/curly/frizzy hair and live in a dry climate with cold winters and not very soft water. Good times. I wanted a tool that would allow me to quickly approximate a salon blowout. Iu2019ve tried doing it with a round brush and blow dryer with less than stellar resultsu2014it takes a long time, my hair ends up enormous and then I have to use a flat iron anyway. With the Double Shot I can run it through my hair and in about 10 minutes itu2019s relatively dry and itu2019s smooth.  Iu2019ve posted two pics: one of my sad efforts with a brush and blow dryer, one where I used the Double Shot for the first time. It took about 10 to 15 minutes with no particular technique, I just kind of ran it through my hair, some big sections, some small. I know I would get even better results if I had more patience, but for me, this was well worth it. Alsou2014it holds up. A really good salon blowout will last me four to five days; the Double Shot I can make last three to four days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! Idk why people are saying the bristles are weak. Mine has held up fine in a house of 4 girls with all different hair types. It leaves my hair super soft with that beautiful salon blow out look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Double Shot Blow-Dryer is amazing and I am able to achieve a full blowout look in about 20 minutes. I have long and thick wavy hair so this purchase was well worth it for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this hair dryer. I have curly (sometimes unruly) long hair. It is colored and can look very dry when I style it. I have a very nice hair dryer and the drybar round brush ...but I struggle to get pretty salon looking hair.  This hairdryer (& I am 51) ... in my opinion is very light weight.  Itu2019s super easy to use and my hair looks and feels amazing!!! Itu2019s soft and shiny ...even without any product in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this. I donu2019t blow dry my hair or use heat often, and I really hate how thin regular straighteners make my hair. But this one dries the hair straight and with volume. Love their tools

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this today and tried it out.  It took about the same time as usual to dry my hair, but wow what a difference it made.  My hair is smooth and shiny.  No need to go over it with a flat iron.  My hair is not thick, and is fairly straight but a bit frizzy when left to air dry.  I am so glad I splurged for this one instead of the one from Revlon.

reviews.review_title: this makes drying my hair quick and FUN!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this dryer brush. It definitely dries my hair quickly and is so much easier than using a brush and hair dryer. Having them in one unit makes drying my hair easier and fun!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Some pros are that for people who donu2019t know how to use a hair brush with blow dryer- this helps with the technical aspects of that. Itu2019s also strong.  Cons are size, bristles get work out within weeks, and you have to have time and patience to really heat up the hair after it is dry to get that smooth salon look. I think itu2019s a good buy for the occasional party but not a daily use for me.  I have thick wavy hair that blow dries beautifully if you give it the time.  I would say let your hair dry a bit before you use this. Takes too long to dry with this alone right out of the shower.  However, it does a good job if you have the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Worst imaginable.  The fingers of the brush massively bended after hardly two months of moderate use.  The brush hairs tangled. Warranty does not enlist this product, though allowing to ship it back to CA (and that - from Canada) at your expense.  Never-ever-again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the concept of this dryer brush. My only complaint is that you really need to blow dry it 80% before using the brush, which kind of defeats the purpose of combining two tools (brush/blow dryer).

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: This is the best product I have ever bought!  I love only using one item to dry my hair, no more fumbling with a hairdryer and a large round brush! This is light and easy to work with, expensive but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use many of Drybaru2019s products and love them. This blow dryer is amazing! Definitely worth it!

reviews.review_title: Can produce a salon quality blowout
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product does give a salon style smooth blowout, but you need; 1. Salon clips to section off the hair 2. A rough dry of the roots with a traditional blow dryer   I had the clips, which helped immensely. To use the dryer, the hair must be sectioned off. I also have discovered that itu2019s best to do a rough dry of the root area, since the brush canu2019t really reach that close to the scalp. I used it for the first time today and was very pleased with the result. No frizz, lots of volume and nice shape. Just cutting down on frizz is worth the extra bit of time it takes to dry my hair with this dryer. If youu2019re on the fence and donu2019t mind a bit of trial and error, you should go ahead and buy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you know how to blow your hair with a blower, do it that way. This product is for people that doesnu2019t know how to do a blow dry. It leaves your hair feeling very dry to the touch. I got normal hair, and i didnu2019t like it at all.  For me, it was the same amiga of time if I was using the blower.  Also to expensive.  Iu2019m not a fan of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very long and thick hair that takes a minimum of 12 hours to dry completely. I am not coordinated enough to use a normal blow dryer and brush while also sectioning through my hair so when I saw this I was super excited!! I went to sephora and spoke to an employee who gave me her honest opinion on the product and since I had gift cards I went for it! I would buy this product 100x over! I love it so much. It takes 30 mins now to dry my whole head while styling it. My only concern is replacing the soft bristles eventually. (First pic is directly after drying and second is the day after)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!!! I have very thick hair and this works!!! I have the dyson styler kit and the dyson hair dryer but this is my absolute favorite. I wish I had bought this instead of all the other stuff!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this heairdryer for two months. I only use it about once a week, and love how it works on my medium length hair. I purchased this one becacuse of the quality of Drybar products I have purchased in the past. TOday, I was using this hairdryer to touch up my hair, and it suddenly got super hot and then just stopped working. I thought I blew a fuse, but I tried a  different outlet, reset GFI, etc, and nothing has helped. So sad I will have to return. Will probably save money and buy a cheaper option. This one was not worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised how big this brush is when it came in. Sorry, I'll have to return this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy to use and cut my blowdrying time in half.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I *loathe* being the bad review standout when there are so many folks happy with this dryer brush ... but it was just OK for me.  The bristles bent, snapped off and clumped into nests after 3 months of use (I only wash/dry once a week, so overuse wasnu2019t the culprit here) and it frizzes my hair something awful now.   If you have thick hair try to temper your expectations :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have crazy thick long hair and THIS product right here is amazing!!! It took only 20 minutes to give myself that perfect blowout! BUY IT!! It left my hair feeling so soft and maintained- donu2019t sleep on this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blow dryer! It works fast and itu2019s super easy to use. I actually enjoyed blowing my hair dry using this. Itu2019s great to brush and blow dry at the same time while using one tool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have such a hard time blow-drying my own hair and always go to DryBar for them to do it for me.  This solved my problem and my hair is smooth and looks great!  It takes a few minutes to get used to it but overall so much easier than a blowdryer and a separate brush.

reviews.review_title: if you suck at hair, this is for you.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve had short hair my entire adult life. Itu2019s now past my shoulders. I suck at doing hair.   Now that my hair doesnu2019t air dry by the time I get to work, I realized I needed to do something about it. Aiming the hair dryer at my head and fluffing my hair around with my fingers like I used to do ended poorly. At my last trim, I asked the stylist to show me how to blow dry my hair and bought the round brush she recommended.  A) if you donu2019t do it perfectly, that round brush tangles so badly in your hair that your husband has to put body lotion on it and extract your hair piece by piece; B) how the heck are you supposed to manage a hair dryer in one hand and a very dangerous round brush in the other, in the mirroru2014backwards?!  Havenu2019t touched the round brush since and go to work with my hair in a bun now.   Just received this Blow-Dryer Brush yesterday and used it for the first time. Game. Changer. The bristles are far enough apart that it doesnu2019t tangle my hair, and completely eliminates the dual-wielding problem. It took about 15 minutes for me to do my whole head. Itu2019s hard to get the very top layer of hair (apparently I need salon clips? Iu2019ll work up to it) but absolutely no complaints. If you suck at hair, this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is inept with a hairdryer, this is the best thing Iu2019ve ever bought for my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will recommend this brush to those who wants healthy and volumizing hair. Remember to purchase a heat protector primer/serum for your hair to  prevent unnecessary dry outs.

reviews.review_title: love it but cheaper options with same results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product. I love Drybar and their products. This made my hair smooth with a blowout look. I am terrible at using a round brush so this is everything I need. HOWEVER, I will remove one star because the Revlon one is just as good. I won the Revlon product at a fundraiser and put it up against this and it was the same result! If you want to splurge this is still a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have flat, fine, thin hair that quickly looses any styling. I am also uncoordinated and challenged by circle brush-hairdryer combo. This tool makes hair styling easy, fast, and lasting. I love it so much I bought one for my mom.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, easy styling for older, disabled users!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I opened the box when my hair was freshly primed and shampooed, decided to go for it without going online and reading the how to style tutorial.  I have fine, sort of wavy, highlighted, sparse hair that is  cut in a layered bob. In three minutes I had a perfectly styled improvement of anything I had ever done with a dryer and round brush!!  I achieved volume, smoothness, height and cuteness without drying out my hair!!  The hardest part was to stop playing with the dryer brush, and keep myself from drying out my hair by using it too much time! Less is more for drying baby fine hair with the Double Shot.    I was sure of my purchase as the owner of Drybaru2019s full size dryer, which has been reliable and durable despite heavy usage by my family.   I am positive about this dryer brush; it feels sturdy and looks well designed.   Drybar could make the first use easier by including  a super easy, large-print laminated basic style guide. This would help those of us hip, stylish older users with visual or physical disabilities to use this amazing dryer as a cool piece of adapted technology!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to spend this much, but after reading reviews that said this is worth the splurge compared to the one by Revlon, Iu2019m so glad I did!! The first time I used it I was hooked! It is so so easy and really does give you that salon blow out look with basically no effort. I cannot for the life of me round brush my hair, if this is you too, buy this!! Itu2019s worth every penny. It dries and styles my hair so quickly, I was shocked the first time I used it. The bristles glide through my hair, Iu2019ve never had one tangle or hair that gets stuck in the bristles. This is the most user friendly tool with amazing results!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried my Momu2019s before purchasing one. I have thick unruly stands (kind of wiry) but unfortunately I donu2019t have a lot of hair... in fact, it is thinning on top near my hair part line. I use the regular dry bar blow dryer with a round brush and my hair takes forever to blow dry due to my awful texture. It always somehow falls flat too so getting volume in the area my hair is thinning is difficult. This tool is phenomenal. I used it on semi-wet hair that I had added some nourishing oil in and a heat protector and I was able to dry it in 15 minutes! Having the ability to grab my hair from the root and blow dry upwards gave me SO much more volume. This blow dryer smoothed my hair and gave it more body. For once, I didnu2019t have the wiry, flat hair I normally do. It feels great to get a little confidence back since my scalp doesnu2019t show as often due to the volume this gave me. Thank you Drybar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Dyson hair dryer and I love it but I have to blow dry to the style I want. Wow this is game changer I donu2019t have to use dryer this does all. I love love this.

reviews.review_title: This one is better the Revlon by far!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of hair and I am not very skilled at using a blow dryer and round brush,  especially the back of my head.  The hair stylist at the salon I go to recommend that I buy a round brush blow dryer from Amazon. I went for the cheapest knock off and the first time I used it I was relatively happy. The second time it started sparking and I could smell burnt plastic so I sent it back and then spent the extra dollars on the Revlon one. I was much happier with the Revlon one, I saw better results then from the knock off and I was content that this one didn't try and set fire to my bathroom. Then Sephora came out with Drybar's version. I didn't need it, I  was content with the Revlon one and the Drybar was a lot more expensive but I just couldn't stop thinking about trying it. I spent more time then I would like to admit on contemplating buying the Drybar, but ultimately I decided to take the plunge and try it since Sephora has a great return policy. Bought it, tried it and fell instantly in love with it! I find this Drybar version easier for me to handle over the Revlon one by far. I am also able to shape my ends which I wasn't able to do with the Revlon, and it dries my hair much faster and way smoother. The quality of the Drybar in looks, feel, and overall drying smoothing volume and shaping far outrank Revlon to me. To give perspective I have long wavy highlighted hair past my mid back, that is layered all over but mostly in the front and I can get my whole head blow dryed in about 10 minutes from towel dryed, and it actually looks like I could have come from a salon. I really recommend this brush blow dryer in one tool for sure if you have long hair, I am not sure how well it works on short hair as the brush itself is quite large.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am the worst blow dryer in the entire world. Actually. My super curly, frizzy hair always comes out of a blow dryer/round brush section eerily reminiscent of a troll doll. This thing, however, is my new miracle tool. My first try, styled with blow dry assist and relaxing cream, came out smooth, bouncy, and voluminous. No learning curve to using, no problem holding it above my head to get volume at the roots, and no major tangles or snares. This thing is amazing! The hotter heat setting definitely produced smoother hair than the lower, obviously, but it is fairly hot! However, I both expect and hope that it would be, so this is not a downside. It produced a blowout my stylist would be proud of, first attempt, and that's saying something! If you have curly, frizzy, crazy hair like me, this will be your holy grail.

reviews.review_text: FINALLY the look and feel of a blow out that I can do myself! Like many others, I had my heart set on the Dyson Airwrap but couldn't make peace with the price tag, so I went with this instead. My hair is long and thick and I could never get the hang of a blow out with a dryer and brush that came out the way I wanted. I've gotten close but it's too much work.  I'm a realist, so I wasn't expecting a miracle. I knew I would to have to use a blow dryer or air dry some first because of my hair type. As long as you're okay with that this is a great product. It's efficient and fool proof - I don't think it's possible to mess up. Takes some practice for specific styling but it's easy to pick up. I prefer to let my hair air dry and I use this when damp and I'm done in less than 15 minutes. This thing is comically huge in real life, but it's perfect for my long hair. Not sure it would work for very short hair. I normally always have bristle issues - it's been a month of use every other day and no problem yet.

reviews.review_text: This is a great tool for beginners who do not know how to blow out their hair the traditional way. Four starts because the device is really big and the twist to change settings is tricky to maneuver. I would have definitely preferred button controls. I was very used to my Chi blow dryer and my Sephora round brush. But I could never get a great blowout and always had to use a flat iron or a large barrel curling iron to finish my style. I didnu2019t wanna dish out 150 bucks on something that I wasnu2019t sure about, so I found one at a discount store that was only $30 but was a Generic type brand.  I tried it out and fell in love with the product. It eliminates the need for the follow up flat iron ore curling iron and cuts down on the amount of time it takes to dry. Plus itu2019s so much easier than having to hold The blow dryer with one hand and spin the round brush with the other.  I bought this product because I was so impressed with the cheapie that I thought that I would get tremendous results. Well this product does work well. I did not see that big a difference in the $30 item versus $150 item. Both give me about the same result. Overall I would say that dryer brushes are awesome. But I only gave this 3 stars because of the price. You can get a good result with something far cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this thinking it would be top quality (even though its an exact copy of the revlon dryer everyone loves). I thought it would just be better quality and I'm willing to pay for quality. But that's not the case. It makes a terrible loud whistling noise every time you turn it on high power. I couldn't take it. I was so excited about this and I thought maybe mine was just defective so I took it back and had them plug in a new one to see if it would also make the loud noise, which it did. So I returned it. Definitely do not waste your money on this. I would go 1 of 2 ways if you're looking for a good product: get the revlon which is substantially less expensive and most definitely better bang for your buck; or invest in the Dyson airwrap. I originally purchased this thinking it would be a good compromise between the 2 (Dyson and Revlon). But honestly, after trying this, I went ahead and got the Dyson and it is worth every penny. The quality is THERE. And if you think about it, you get 8 attachments, which comes out to be a good deal if you ask me. $550 for 8 attachments and a truly unique, high tech, high quality product, or $150 for this Revlon-rip off piece of junk. The dyson will replace most all of your other hair products and is a major win over this think.

It breaks my heart a bit to write this, because indeed the blow out I got from the blow-dry brush was fantastic, but I can't reccomend this product because the bristles are so flimsy. I've used it only four times, and not only are the shorter smoothing bristles crushed, but four or five of the longer, yellow-tipped bristles have collapsed already. I have pretty smooth, easy-to-brush hair, so it's not a case of having course or difficult hair. Unfortunately, I'm going to have to return this and go on the hunt for something similar but more sturdy. Other things I did like is the grip, cord length, and cooler tip. If it weren't for the bristles, this would have been my forever go-to rave-to-all-who'll-listen blow dryer.

reviews.review_text: I have very curly latina hair, think Shakira. I am able to blow dry it with a round brush, but never got as much bounce as I wanted to and would end up a frizzy mess. So then I would have to use a flat iron, and the whole process would take me 35 min. And if I wanted any curl in my hair at the ends, I'd then have a curling iron that I'd sometimes used to get it right. This blow-dryer is nothing but magic. And, the next morning I'll use it to re-fresh my hair (only spend 5 minutes) to get the sleep kinks out and it looks even more fabulous. No frizz! No flat iron needed! This blow dryer has finally made straight hair easy for me. I use bumble and bumble all style blow dry and finish with bumble and bumble soft texture finishing spray. I think I sold 4 the first time I used this at the gym. I have no idea how it will hold up with time, but so far it is nothing short of perfection. Not too heavy, love the part on top so I can hold with both hands, and the cool setting is perfect to cool yourself off when done.

Iu2019m using the med and it does take just as long as a dryer. Not keen on using the hot as my hair is fine and color treated. I am using a heat product but Iu2019m doubting that can completely stop damage on high heat. The cold does work, it just takes the brush a few min to change temps.   Gives great body to hair but it took me awhile to figure out how to get body at top of my head. Think rollers. Same principle applies with the brush. My hair is smooth it does look like a blow out. I just wish Sephora would give a 60 day trial. I blow my hair out once a week so Iu2019ve only used it 3 times and 30 days is almost up.

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this.  I have had the Revlon one for a year and use it every single day.  I have super curly, very fine hair and blow dry it into submission every day. To be really, really honest, they both perform exactly the same.  The Drybar is maybe a tiny amount quieter, and the barrel doesn't get quite as hot. Also I have a hard time spinning the barrel on the Drybar one.  It doesn't turn as easily as the Revlon one.  But, all of that is water under the bridge because STATIC.  Sure, I could douse my hair in silicone but I don't want to do that. I have never needed to before.  I literally changed nothing else about my routine except from the Revlon dryer to this one and my hair is plastered to my head with static.  I thought it was just an off day, so I tried it again for several more days just to be met with static, static, and more static.  So, sadly this is going back and I'll buy another $40 Revlon dryer.

reviews.review_text: I gave this hair dryer/brush a try since there were so many good reviews. But I have to say it was very disappointing. I have an old rotating dryer brush from Babyliss made with boar bristles that I definitely recommend instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! My only caveat is that the cold setting is not very cold. Love it though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have hated blow drying my own hair. So much so, that I have been getting a blow out every 1-2 weeks for the last year. I picked this up as a Christmas present to myself and I absolutely love it. The bristles hold my hair, while also allowing it to glide through. My hair is naturally curly-wavy, doing my hair at home usually involves a flat brush, round brush, and a curling iron. Now with the Double Shot, I donu2019t need any of it. My hair comes out voluminous, silky, and frizz-free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally worth it. Iu2019ve tried a multitude of tools from Dyson and Drybar and this is by far my favorite of all of them. reviews.review_title: Buy it from Revlon for less!
reviews.review_text: Reckon makes the same thing for less that drys hair a lot faster.  Donu2019t waste money on packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So simple and quick! I am pleased with this purchase. At first, I questioned the high price, but got a $50 gift card, so I decided to buy this. NOT DISAPPOINTED AT ALL! I have used it twice since it arrived and my hair looks silly smooth, full of boucey curled ends and volume. I have a head full of long, dark and layered hair, so I thought this would take forever to dry. I used while wet, and dried in smaller sections. I was done in approx 15-20 mins Max. I normally take 30 mins with a standard dryer and round brush, then run a curler through it too for nice ends. This cut that down to our one tool. again, I'm please and this was a good buy. One thing to note,the barrel is pretty large, so of you have weak wrists or smaller hands, it does make a bit more challenging to hold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t pay enough attention to the size of the brush head - and itu2019s enormous.  Way to big to actually put some bend in my hair.  Pretty much the same size as the Revlon brush, but for 3 times the price.  This one is going back.

reviews.review_title: I guess if you like FRIZZ, ripped out hair and...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this ZERO stars I would! Great idea, terrible execution! First of all the brush is very large , fine I get that (not ideal would have preferred it too be a little smaller in circumference) but itu2019s not made of regular bristles, they are plastic and will rip your hair out. In the end it left my hair a FRIZZ MESS, with static so bad I canu2019t remember ever having static and definitely not like this. A total fail. Itu2019s being return ASAP. Really disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, so I immediately had to write this review in mid use of this hairdryer! My hair is literally half wet and I interrupted my drying just to write this review in how amazing this dryer is! Iu2019m really upset that I purchased Dyson hair dryer and the new Dyson curling dryer before this. I guess my Dyson dryers will go in our guest bathrooms now because I no longer need them! This dryer is easy to use and leaves you hair soooooo soft!!!!! I have thin hair but I have a lot of it and I was worried the brush would pull my hair but not at all! This easily runs through me hair with ease! Ladies and gentlemen; this is a must buy!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works well. Very slight learning curve on how to hold it for maximum effectiveness, but you should get the hang of it after a use or two. This gets very hot on high, hotter than the Revlon version, so use a heat protector. My medium length fine hair can be dried in 10 mins. Occasionally I will need a couple passes from a flatiron for frizz and flyaways. Works well for drying, volume, and minimal straightening. Can get a slight curl at the end, but nothing dramatic. Is it nice? Yes. Is it necessary? No. Is it 4-5x better than the Revlon as the price would suggest? Debatable. This does have a better warranty I think but still...it is a LOT pricier for a non-essential tool. See if you can try this at a Drybar or dept. store before committing. I wish Sephora had floor models of their tools since buying and returning isnu2019t the best method.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was debating between giving this three stars and four, and here's why. As an avid hair dryer and total idiot when it comes to using a round brush I was excited to finally pull the trigger and buy this. My first one was a lemon and burnt out after a few minutes of use. The second one is fantastic, BUT the soft bristles are definitely bending and it definitely does not cut the drying time in half. With my normal blow dryer it would take me 8-10min and with this it was a solid 13-18min. I also feel like for the future, they need to redesign to get better coverage to get the roots since they're hard to dry right now, but overall this was a good buy and I'm totally in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Completely changed my morning routine. I have always struggled to blow dry my hair with a regular round brush and dryer- it never came out like it does at a salon. With this, I can dry my hair, which is long and thick, in about 15 mins and get a professional looking blowout. So helpful, especially in the winter when I hate leaving the house with wet hair. Not too hot, pretty light to hold, not too loud, magical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has made my life sooooo much easier!!!!!!!! It saves me at least 15 minutes every morning and my hair is super soft and I can either use it to get straight hair or smooth waives. I LOVE IT

reviews.review_title: Works even on thick, curly hair!

reviews.review_text: AMAZING!!! I have really curly, thick hair and was skeptical that this would work. But it did! Seriously a game changer. It holds tension really well, and is easy to maneuver. Amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: A week ago (after my 1st and 2nd use) I would have been on here giving this 5 stars. It was a life changer for my hair! With the double shot I can go from soaking wet hair to smooth,straight hair in 25 mins! After the first use I was IN LOVE! I did think it was quite noisy and had a strange sound on times.  Fast forward to my 3rd use, about 10 days after owning it ... it completely died 15 mins into my styling. I reset it, let it cool down, tried different outlets...... ITS DEAD! I will return it and get a new one ... really hoping it was a lemon because I donu2019t know how i will love without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had very disappointing results with this dryer. It dries your hair fast, but the barrel is too large to add any shape or style.   I  have shoulder length, fine textured hair in great condition- I don't color it. I usually blow dry with a separate round brush (to add body) and turn the ends under with a curling iron. I was hoping I could ditch the brush, and get the same results with this dryer. I tried it on several settings, but all it did was hyper-straighten any wave or bounce out of my hair, and leave it super-resistant to the curling iron.   My results were (for the price) a one-star sad trumpet. But I still gave it 3 stars, because I could imagine it working for someone with curly, unruly hair, who wanted to flatten and straighten their hair.

reviews.review_text: Ok I need to leave this review because this tool is amazing. For those who look for a comparison, I also have the complete Dyson Styler. I was on the fence about this tool because I love my Dyson styler, but now that I have it, I am glad I bought it i have fine straight hair, shoulder length for now, and this tool makes my hair so shiny, smooth, and with tons of volume at the root and everywhere. My hair is super bouncy after using it, and it lasts. I also love the Dyson styler for the innovative curling heads, and the straight brushes are also awesome, but gives a more natural blowout, which is also nice. But the Drybar one gives a toooon of volume and the style is more polished. My hair dried in no time, and I found the tool easy to use. This is awesome. I am super challenged with styling my hair with just a brush and dryer, so having all these tools help me stay polished and well put together. I love both the Dyson styler and this Drybar brush, with slightly liking this Drybar more than the Dyson straight/smooth head brushes :-) I love the Dyson more for easy, damage-free curling (versus a hot iron). I hope this helps!

reviews.review_text: I like this product, because I am usually low maintenance when it comes to my hair. My photos are after first time using product. reviews.review_title: Sorry, but I don't recommend this product

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love the Drybar Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush, but u2026. I found it difficult to turn on and off.  The dial is problematic in its operation.  The dryer is loud and cumbersome and there are three heat settings, cold, medium and hot.  Well, the cold is just cool air, the medium is just medium air and the hot setting is HOT air.  Again, the settings dial is awkward.  I have mid-length curly hair and I think the styling effect is too harsh.  It made my hair flat and fly away, pulling out all the curl (I want volume and some curl), which leaves me with no alternative but to return the item.  I think the idea is great but they fail in execution.  Sorry, I do not recommend this product, but I do love all their shampoos, conditions and style products.

reviews.review_text: Love this new blow dryer! So so much better than the revlon blow dryer in my opinion. I have to return the revlon because it was too hot and the brush is the worst for fine hair. I canu2019t wait for the travel size!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This thing is amazing! I have thick, coarse, blonde hair that my whole life I have struggled to style, and takes forever to blow dry. I am growing out a pixie right now, and have resigned myself to a ponytail for the past month straight... not anymore! In 10 minutes using this I have a somewhat normal looking bob, the best my hair has looked in a while. It was really easy to use, but bigger than I was expecting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great brush for a quick blowout. Left my hair with a sleek natural look. Lightweight on your hands and very manageable for all hair types. WOULD recommend.

reviews.review_title: I could not be more disappointed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting so much more from this brand, and for a dryer of this price point. I have a long thick hair which is naturally wavy. Despite wrapping the hair around the round brush of this dryer, and pulling it like I would to get a good firm pull on it, the air that comes out of this dryer is incredibly weak, and if your hair is healthy at all, itu2019ll take forever to dry. Even after I finally got a section dry, it was fluffy and frizzy,  Not even close to the straightening or smoothing that a brush would do with a powerful hairdryer. I donu2019t know where all these people are who are posting positive reviews, if your hair is long and thick, donu2019t even think about getting this dryer

reviews.review_title: not sure itu2019s worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works as advertised. Despite my dread to straighten my wavy hair, this works faster than my Revlon hair dryer brush. Iu2019m sure there are less expensive & bulky alternatives but donu2019t tell me about them now please.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: So far am loving it! I am growing out a pixie cut and itu2019s working great for me. Giving 4 stars rather than 5 as the brush is a little too big for me, could be a bit smaller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t write reviews, but I loved this brush so much that I felt the need to say how much I love it.  Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments on my hair and I love the way my hair looks.  I loved it so much I bought a second one as a Christmas gift for my sister.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like a professional blowout from home. Absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tool is amazing!  Even with a professional blowdryer, it takes about 30 minutes to dry my incredibly thick, curly, coarse hair.  This brush got my hair smooth and dry in 15 minutes!  Plus, it feels silky smooth!  Very impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this thing! I have long hair thatu2019s fine (but a lot of it) some areas are pretty straight, the front pieces are curly. I HATE blow drying my hair. I actively avoid it. It takes too long and it doesnu2019t look good after. This tool is a game changer. Dries my whole head in about 10 min, sectioning off the top and bottom halves. And it looks soo good. Smooth, shiny, and tons of volume at the roots. And it gets my curly areas smooth enough that I donu2019t need to touch them with a flat iron! It has low/high settings which is nice. Doesnu2019t make my hair feel dry or crispy or anything. Lightweight, my arm doesnu2019t get tired at all using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this blow dryier last week and this is fantastic. Easy to use. Full recomended

reviews.review_title: Good, but might be a novelty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for the first time and here are my first impressions. First, I will say that I donu2019t have the type of hair that will be sleek and polished just from a blow out. That said, I do think that the double shot did a pretty good job blowing my hair out straighter than it would if it air dried. It also simplified the process because I didnu2019t have to hold a brush in one hand and a blow dryer in the other. I also noticed that this doesnu2019t get THAT hot - the buttercup gets way hotter. Iu2019m not saying thatu2019s necessarily a bad thing because it would probably be difficult to handle if it got really hot.   A few cons: I am concerned about the longevity of the boar bristles that enable you to get some tension while blow drying. After the first use they do seem a bit frazzled so Iu2019m not sure what the shelf life of this will be. If those bristles become super tangled youu2019ll pretty much have to toss it. Second, and perhaps not that big of a deal, I find this thing to be borderline deafening in my ear when I dry sections in front of my face.   Overall, I like it and would recommend trying it out, but I donu2019t think it achieves the same results as a traditional blowout with a round brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought mine a few days ago and I absolutely love it!!! It cuts my blow dry time in half. It made my hair super shiny and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t think I needed this tool until I tried it! My hair went from damp shower hair to blowout smooth hair within a couple minutes of styling! I normally use a blow dryer and hair straightener in the morning after a shower but using the double shot cut my time in a half. This is a $150 blow dryer brush, so my high expectations were met considering the high price tag. I do recommend using a good heat protectant serum for your hair prior to using it! Seems to have better results from my experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with the double shot! I was skeptical since the brush crush did nothing for me and I was worried this would be another dud but it isn't.  I have 2C hair that really poofs and frizzes and tangles if I'm not careful. Luckily that didn't happen with this and I had nice straight, flat hair in under 30 minutes! Another big plus is it gives me more volume than blow drying and straightening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Many have compared this to Revlonu2019s $30 version so I waited until I used this one at least 4-5 times to provide some insight. I had the Revlon brush and it fried my hair. The more I used it, the more damage I did and the more split ends I saw. I did love the idea of having just 1 tool to blow dry my hair so I decided to try this one. This one takes a few minutes longer to dry than the Revlon, mainly because it doesnu2019t get as hot (which to me is a good thing). It is also lighter in weight and gives an unbelievable bounce/volume. Overall I am quite happy with it. Reasons why Iu2019m giving it 4 and not 5 stars is: #1 - at $150, price is a bit steep, if this would be close to $100, I would think itu2019s a great value. #2 - I still think the hair looks healthier when you blow dry with a traditional blow dryer!

reviews.review_title: Less Damaging than its Competitors - Works well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have long, naturally curly, thick blonde hair. I usually blow-dry my hair with a round brush and a Chi dryer, and my hair looks great when I do this, but the technique took me years to master and itu2019s a pain to do. Iu2019ve previously used the Revlon round blowdry brush and it produces beautiful results but it was HOT, my hair dried quickly but I could tell it was damaging my hair (like my hair was becoming straw like texture) and then quit working after 2 months. I like this brush better, it gets less hot than the Revlon brush, which left my hair feeling less damaged. It still worked quickly and I was left with a nice blowout. I used the hottest setting for the bottom layers of my hair and used the lower heat setting for my top layers (that have more damage and baby hairs) and my hair was left shiny and bouncy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off there is a drugstore version for a quarter of the price - if your willing to spend the money I highly recommend the drybar one. This thing is AMAZING. From soaking wet hair to dry and styled in 15 minutes?? Where has this been my whole life. Iu2019m hooked and itu2019s seriously the only tool I need when I travel. You get a gorgeous blow out look in minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easily 5 stars.  Complete game changer for me.  I have thick mixed textured hair.  I have never been able to hold a brush and a blow dryer and do a blow out in my own hair.  And i usually have to blow dry my am hair then flat iron/curl it.  Omg my hair just from using this is so silky, shiny, and voluminous.  It made my hair routine soooo much easier and faster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never written a review on Sephora, but this blow dryer brush was phenomenal, I was able to get an effortless blow dry look in under 30 minutes!! Absolutely quick and easy and will be recommending to friends. (Also I have never blow dried my hair so I had no experience and I did it easily!!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Buy it! This product is seriously amazing. I had been wanting to buy a Dyson hairdryer until this came out and it dries it hair faster than the Dyson my hairdresser uses!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I guess if you had naturally straight hair and just want to blow dry for volume this would work. I have curly frizzy hair and it was not up to the task!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone wants to know how this compares to another popular brand with a similar hairdryer at a third of the cost. I notice two major differences which, for me, warrant the additional expense. (1) This doesnu2019t get as hot on the low setting, so it doesnu2019t scorch my fine hair and it leaves it really smooth. (2) The barrel is slightly smaller, so it curls my ends a bit as opposed to just making them flip out 70s style. I subtracted one star for the noise and the fact that the cool setting isnu2019t a button but I otherwise recommend this one over other popular brands if itu2019s within your budget.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In love! It took me like a third of the time to blow dry my very long hair.

reviews.review_title: It works on very curly hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to buy this to see if I would work on my very curly (but manageable) 4A type hair. It does! A blowout that usually takes a 45 minutes was reduced to 15 with this tool and Drybar's quick-dry serum. My biggest concern was my curly roots, which got blown out a bit, but I still had to run over them with a straightening iron. That was to be expected, since my roots are stubbornly curly.  For my curly girls, I highly recommend this dryer! It surprised me, someone who ordered this with extreme skepticism. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited about this. Unfortunately, mine overheated abc started smoking after 5 minutes of use. Plan on returning ASAP.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yet again, Drybar manages to make a tool that blows me away. I was hesitant about buying this but it was worth every penny. I struggle with my hair being thick, frizzy and curly but this took smoothes and tames my hair and makes me look like I just came from the salon. It does take a little bit of practice but once you have it down you wonu2019t be able to go without it. I highly recommend watching the videos- they definitely help you figure out techniques and tricks. Overall this is a high quality and effective tool and one Iu2019m hooked on.

reviews.review_title: easy to use, gets super hot, dries my hair quickly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this blowdryer brush! First of all, I'm not very good with the blow-dryer and round brush. I mean, I love a good blowdryer, but round brushing is a struggle. So it's super nice being able to use 1 tool. Honestly, I grew up using my mom's version of this brush that never got hot enough which took forever to blowdry. I love how hot this tool gets. And I'm serious when I say that it gets hot, so be careful! What else I also like is that the barrel isn't as wide as some of the other ones that are out there. I mean, it's definitely not a narrow barrel but it's definitely is easier to use on my shorter hair. It's actually pretty comfortable on my hands too. I'm pretty much very happy with this new addition to my hair tools collection. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just used my Double shot for the first time today and all I can say is WOW!!! I'm throwing my round brush away. it glides thru my hair super easy. My hair looks smooth and full of volume and it took 10 minutes.

reviews.review_title: My First Drybar Product, and I'm in Love!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this! I can blow out my chin-length 2c/3a curly hair in about 5 minutes. It's lightweight for as big as it is, and it's very easy to use. The two types of bristles grip my hair well so I don't have to hold the ends, and it leaves my hair extremely smooth, soft, and shiny. Plus, it easily straightened the curls at my roots and even the shorter pieces of hair. It gave me a decent amount of body (though my second-day hair was very flat), too. It's LOUD, but I got used to it pretty quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long thick hair that I have never been able to blow out myself. Literally have spent so much money on blow outs every few weeks anytime I have a party, work conference or event that calls for a more polished look. Iu2019ve used this twice now and it honestly has me cancelling all of my blow out appointments. Both times Iu2019ve used it I have been able to maintain the results for 4 days before having to wash and restyle. Took a couple tries to get down the  technique for the right volume at the crown and ends but seriously so SO pleased with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. I owned the Revlon brush. I also own the Dyson blow dryer and the Buttercup blow dryer, but this stands out from all of the other three. Why? It dries my hair (I have a lot of it) in 15 minutes and it doesnu2019t weigh. Thatu2019s just one thing I did t like about the Revlon one, with the weight of the brush and the weight of my hair my arms and wrists would hurt 10 minutes in. This brush stands out. My arms didnu2019t hurt, my hair dried straight and it didnu2019t feel like my hair itself was fried. The Revlon brush made my hair feel fried, it dried it out and it smelled like it was frying my hair in the process. The Double Shot blow dry brush left my hair smooth and soft. I truly love this brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite purchases of 2019! I am getting nothing but compliments on my hair. Worth every penny and great quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well on partially dry hair. Gave 4/5 stars because I purchased this after breaking my arm so I could style my hair using only one arm. The handle of this tool is very thick and difficult to maneuver (but not impossible) with only one arm. For future product improvements make the handle more ergonomically friendly to enable one-handed use, and add a brush spin option for easy of use

reviews.review_title: Canu2019t use a round brush no matter what? Get this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tool! Iu2019ve used a lot of hair dryer and brush combos over the years and this is by far my favorite.  I have wavy/curly medium-fine hair that naturally wants to behave like a rats nest. This makes my hair smooth and takes the frizz my hair is prone to. Dries the hair fast as well.  Itu2019s too soon to know how it holds up over time, but the results so far are great. And like all Drybar products the cheery color is great in the morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: guys save your money and just buy the Revlon version that they are copying lol they copied the exact product and just tripled the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love it! A day later and my hair is still super smooth! Itu2019s a game changer for sure u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This would be a 5 but Iu2019m giving it a 3 only because the soft bristles after 2 uses already donu2019t seem like they are going to hold up. They already are collapsing down and not staying straight up :( which makes me think I wonu2019t get the same results the more I use it. For the price I should have soft bristles that will last a lot longer. The hard bristles are fine itu2019s just the soft one. I guess from the tension but I hope they arenu2019t flat after month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from a promo that I won and Iu2019ve been using it for the last two days I have super curly hair and usually a pain in the butt to blow dry this tool has made it so easy Iu2019m so excited and ecstatic about it and I think every single woman should own one!
